description:
Robadair Ltd. is a precision metal manufacturer that services the Commercial, Defense, and Aerospace industries. We are looking to add a dynamic individual to our team in the Quality Assurance Department.
The Quality Assurance Inspector will be responsible for inspecting sheet metal and machined parts to drawings, verifying the part meets the requirements, and entering the information into various databases.
These tasks may include:

 Interpreting prints
 Inspecting parts manually
 Inspecting parts with the assistance of automated or semi-automated inspection equipment
 Inputting information into databases
 Working closely with other employees to troubleshoot problems
 Other duties as assigned

The ideal candidate will have these characteristics:

 Ability to or willingness to learn to read prints
 Attention to detail
 Manual dexterity
 Ability to perform repetitive tasks
 Team player
 Experienced with computer systems and software: specifically Microsoft Excel

Education Requirement:

 High-School Diploma
 Some College or University
 Completion of College or University
 Or a combination of education and experience

Previous Experience:

 Previous experience with manual measuring equipment is considered an asset, willing to train

What we offer:

 A great working team environment
 Fixed shifts for work-life balance; Mon-Thurs 2:30pm to 3am
 Friday to Sundays off
 Safety boot allowance
 Employee referral bonuses
 Paid sick leave
 A comprehensive benefits package upon employment

This is a Permanent - Full-Time position on our day shift. We offer a competitive benefits package upon employment.
To be considered for the role, you must be eligible to work in Canada and currently residing in Ottawa, ON.
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: From $18.00 per hour
Expected hours: 40 per week
Benefits:

 Company events
 Dental care
 Disability insurance
 Employee assistance program
 Extended health care
 Life insurance
 On-site parking
 Paid time off
 Profit sharing

Flexible Language Requirement:

 French not required

Schedule:

 8 hour shift
 Day shift
 No weekends

Supplemental pay types:

 Overtime pay

Work Location: In person
